description: Threat actors can use the PsLogList utility to dump event log in order to extract admin accounts and perform account discovery.
false_positives: Another tool that uses the command line switches of PsLogList
Legitimate use of PsLogList by an administrator
name: Suspicious Use of PsLogList
query: ((winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"psloglist.exe" OR process.executable:(*\\psloglist.exe OR *\\psloglist64.exe)) OR (process.command_line:*security* AND process.command_line:*accepteula* AND process.command_line:(*\ \-d* OR *\ \/d* OR *\ \-x* OR *\ \/x* OR *\ \-s* OR *\ \/s*)))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali @nas_bench
